width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b45047d840decfe814b510f30d5de521_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b45047d840decfe814b510f30d5de521_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b45047d840decfe814b510f30d5de521_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在颈部，前正中线上，喉结与下颌之间。</p><p><b>功效：</b>排毒祛淤，活血通脉。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ffa0a5edfa8776d860cec28254300261_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ffa0a5edfa8776d860cec28254300261_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ffa0a5edfa8776d860cec28254300261_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>内踝尖下1寸，内踝下缘边际凹陷中， 在足大趾外展肌的止点处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>吸热生气。</p><p><b>【症状三】：脾胃积热</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-367c5abbe1aedcbd40b4593b898c19f5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-367c5abbe1aedcbd40b4593b898c19f5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-367c5abbe1aedcbd40b4593b898c19f5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在手背，第1、2掌骨间，当第2掌骨桡侧的中点处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>镇静止痛，通经活经，清热解表。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b36086b609470b63151e7f1762cfe54c_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b36086b609470b63151e7f1762cfe54c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b36086b609470b63151e7f1762cfe54c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b36086b609470b63151e7f1762cfe54c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b36086b609470b63151e7f1762cfe54c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b36086b609470b63151e7f1762cfe54c_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足背，当第2、3跖骨结合部前方凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清降胃火，通涤腑气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-54d68f51bac948b4e59d5612a40ad2fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-54d68f51bac948b4e59d5612a40ad2fd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>小儿麻痹症的施灸穴位</b></h2><p><b>主穴：</b>肩髃、曲池、外关（上肢瘫痪）</p><p>环跳、阳陵泉、悬钟（下肢瘫痪）</p><p><b>配穴：</b>伏兔、足三里、合谷（肌肉萎缩）</p><hr/><p>注：</p><p>1）主配穴结合，依附属症状选择施灸。温和灸/每穴10-20分钟，每日1次，10次1疗程；</p><p>2）施灸顺序应遵循先上后下、先左后右、先背部后胸腹、先头身后四肢的顺序进行。</p><hr/><p><b>取穴比量法：</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;86&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><hr/><h2><b>主 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：上肢瘫痪</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb2b68085178b1f5d342caeb6b45ba75_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb2b68085178b1f5d342caeb6b45ba75_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb2b68085178b1f5d342caeb6b45ba75_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb2b68085178b1f5d342caeb6b45ba75_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb2b68085178b1f5d342caeb6b45ba75_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb2b68085178b1f5d342caeb6b45ba75_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在肩部，三角肌上，臂外展或向前平伸时，当肩峰前下方凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>疏经利节，祛风通络，理气化痰。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>屈肘成直角，当肘弯横纹尽头处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>经气运行之大关。清热解表，舒经通络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bdc6c1345d80824765b8a285d7efc3d3_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bdc6c1345d80824765b8a285d7efc3d3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bdc6c1345d80824765b8a285d7efc3d3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bdc6c1345d80824765b8a285d7efc3d3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bdc6c1345d80824765b8a285d7efc3d3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-bdc6c1345d80824765b8a285d7efc3d3_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在前臂背侧后区，当阳池与肘尖的连线上，腕背侧远端横纹上2寸，尺骨与桡骨间隙中点。</p><p><b>功效：</b>联络气血，补阳益气。</p><p><b>【症状二】：下肢瘫痪</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-492a0db8801d261edf527c075790dca0_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-492a0db8801d261edf527c075790dca0_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-492a0db8801d261edf527c075790dca0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-492a0db8801d261edf527c075790dca0_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-492a0db8801d261edf527c075790dca0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-492a0db8801d261edf527c075790dca0_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>侧卧屈股位，在股骨大转子最高点与骶骨裂孔的连线上，外1/3与中1/3的交点处取穴。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾益气，利腰腿，通经络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿外侧，当腓骨头前下方凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>舒肝解郁，消炎利胆。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-573f9a5255647db5e8906f90f7d2acbc_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-573f9a5255647db5e8906f90f7d2acbc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-573f9a5255647db5e8906f90f7d2acbc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-573f9a5255647db5e8906f90f7d2acbc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-573f9a5255647db5e8906f90f7d2acbc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-573f9a5255647db5e8906f90f7d2acbc_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿外侧， 外踝尖上3寸，腓骨前缘凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>泄胆火，清髓热，舒筋脉；平肝熄风，舒肝益肾。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状】：肌肉萎缩</b></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在大腿前面，当髂前上棘与髌骨外侧端的连线上，髌骨上缘上6寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>散寒化湿，疏通经络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在手背，第1、2掌骨间，当第2掌骨桡侧的中点处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>镇静止痛，通经活经，清热解表。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c34e390cf5669ef03fd3621e1aec1c0d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c34e390cf5669ef03fd3621e1aec1c0d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c34e390cf5669ef03fd3621e1aec1c0d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;580&#39; height=&#39;196&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c34e390cf5669ef03fd3621e1aec1c0d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c34e390cf5669ef03fd3621e1aec1c0d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c34e390cf5669ef03fd3621e1aec1c0d_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcec6e9698adde94d9bdf7a1c513f0a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"710\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcec6e9698adde94d9bdf7a1c513f0a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1280&#39; height=&#39;710&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1280\" data-rawheight=\"710\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1280\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcec6e9698adde94d9bdf7a1c513f0a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcec6e9698adde94d9bdf7a1c513f0a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一百多年前，敦煌，夏天刚揭幕，苍凉而贫瘠的大地变得愈加躁动。</p><p>一场意外发生了，千佛洞的守窟人打破洞窟墙壁，却露出藏有数以万计经卷的石室。一千年来，这座藏经洞不仅掩藏着主要出自唐代的无价之宝，也掩藏了许多不为人知晓的故事。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1670800ca495c6f4dd72a83f50078b65_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"676\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1670800ca495c6f4dd72a83f50078b65_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;676&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"676\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1670800ca495c6f4dd72a83f50078b65_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1670800ca495c6f4dd72a83f50078b65_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>“菩提本无树，明镜亦非台。</b> <b>本来无一物，何处惹尘埃。”</b></p><p>今天大多数人都知道这个故事，据说禅宗五祖弘忍座下的慧能与神秀争夺传法衣钵。神秀写下“身是菩提树，心为明镜台，时时勤拂拭，勿使惹尘埃”的偈子，却被慧能更加精妙的作品击败，从此禅宗分裂为南北两宗。师兄神秀北上洛阳、长安，很快得到皇室供养，嗣法子弟盛极一时，被后世人称为北禅宗；慧能传下南宗，当时默默无闻。</p><p>重见天日的经卷文书显示，慧能一系并不甘于寂寞。</p><p>人们不仅在藏经洞中发现禅宗六祖慧能所著《坛经》、慧能晚年的得意弟子菏泽神会法师所著《神会语录》，又在西域发现《神会语录》的残片。</p><p>了解南北之争的人难免会疑惑，当神秀的门徒成为“两京法主，三帝门师”占据主流地位之时，为什么默默无闻的南派禅宗竟然能远达西域广为散布？</p><p><b>天宝末年，安史之乱。</b></p><p>这一次席卷半个中国的叛乱，尽管让朝廷失去了西域，却让南禅宗抓住了机会。当时，郭子仪率领驻扎西北的朔方军南下平叛，出现经费不足的状况。</p><p>作为慧能最活跃的弟子，神会法师为郭子仪筹措资金，对朔方军收复长安、洛阳做出贡献，而朔方军的一些将士也因之成为南派禅宗的信徒，带动禅宗势力扩展，经籍随之流传。</p><p>人们或许会觉得佛门弟子本该不问世事、四大皆空，然而神会法师主动参与政治与战争，此举岂不是有违清净之心？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-90618559935b93f8c4ae5c5017f09f17_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-90618559935b93f8c4ae5c5017f09f17_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-90618559935b93f8c4ae5c5017f09f17_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-90618559935b93f8c4ae5c5017f09f17_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>禅意在今天被理解为清空、安宁的心。</b></p><p>人们眼中的禅，是平和的心态、淡定的情怀，以及从容幽静、自在安然的表现。今天的人们大错特错了。真正的禅是当下承担、临机果断，为了推倒旧的知见，不惜采取激烈手段。</p><p>有的禅师掌掴天子，有的禅师斧劈佛像，恰如他们所说的逢佛杀佛，逢祖杀祖，慧能就曾对自己未来的徒孙做出一个预言，“马驹踏杀天下人。”</p><p>这一匹睥睨天下、大杀四方的马驹就是马祖道一禅师。</p><p>一次，洪州的水潦和尚去参见马祖，并向他请教——达摩祖师西来有何用意？马祖就让水潦和尚先行礼。正当行礼之时，马祖突然抬腿，一脚将对方踢翻，水潦和尚大悟。</p><p>后来洪州的法会禅师问了同样的问题，马祖向他勾勾手，让他小声点，并要他走近之后再告诉他。</p><p>当法会靠过来，马祖给了他一个响亮的耳光。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca060cfc27548b08d618449f1d3d5dad_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca060cfc27548b08d618449f1d3d5dad_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca060cfc27548b08d618449f1d3d5dad_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca060cfc27548b08d618449f1d3d5dad_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>真正的禅意，是一种雄赳赳的气概。</b></p><p>一掌一脚，马祖打得突兀又激烈，却穿透言语字句，抵达不思不惟的彼岸；而他这种临机决断、杀活由我的自信，正是禅门最主张的干脆利落、截断众流的宗风，因此也就慢慢形成了禅宗最惯用的当头棒喝的手段。</p><p>因为禅机所谓的机，正是因缘凑巧而成、千钧一发的决定时刻，如果没有一种敢于担当的大勇气与乾坤独断的大智慧，根本无法直面与解决当下的问题。</p><p>想必，南禅宗的神会法师在安史之乱时一团乱麻的局势中知机见机，果断行事，如同天下豪杰一般亮出金刚王宝剑的锋芒，去主动当担天下的命运。</p><p><b>芒种是人们最接近禅的时日。</b></p><p>古代经师在《周礼》地官的稻人条目下，如此注解：芒种，稻麦也。当初夏揭幕，禾麦生芒，如同禅门棒喝，稻麦呈现生命的锋芒，也绽放善护众生的光芒。所谓的芒种，就是宣告自己的成熟与饱满，也即将承担人间食粮的使命。</p><p>在恰当的时机，让生命锋芒毕露，这也是芒种的神髓，如此，当下即展现雄赳赳的气概。</p><p>同样，一刻艾认为，当下的礼物是艾。</p><p>艾灸虽然是古老的传承，却在二十一世纪的今天散发着无与伦比的活力，无论是治病还是保健都有重要的一席之地。我们发愿传扬艾文化，以用于承担之心，独家打造对症下灸的云端数据平台，凡是人们身体若有不适则可输入不适症状，获得古法艾灸疗法的扶助。</p><p>我们坚信——福种常播纯阳气，艾草还为人世芳。我们不惜锋芒毕露，不顾付出多大的努力，都要让这份当下的礼物，绽放光芒。</p><p><b>节气灸丨养心助阳</b></p><p>大部分地区的人们开始体验到夏天的炎热，空气湿度大，闷热难耐，我们应该预防中暑、空调病和急性肠胃炎。尤其是中部的长江中、下游地区，雨量增多，气温升高，进入连绵阴雨的梅雨季节，空气十分潮湿，天气异常湿热，暑令湿胜必多兼感，使人感到四肢困倦，萎靡不振。在芒种节气要注意增强体质，避免季节性疾病和传染病的发生，如中暑、腮腺炎、水痘等。</p><p>▌<b>节气灸（九）丨芒种养生穴位小结</b></p><p>大椎、心俞、神门、太白，涌泉</p><p>温和灸，每日一次，每次每穴艾灸15—20分钟，6月5－7日连灸三天。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f5be92e741570de9b149c822cf169dc_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f5be92e741570de9b149c822cf169dc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f5be92e741570de9b149c822cf169dc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f5be92e741570de9b149c822cf169dc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f5be92e741570de9b149c822cf169dc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0f5be92e741570de9b149c822cf169dc_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>正坐低头，于颈部下端第7颈椎棘突下凹陷处。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3000615a85af4bacf4914daabac683ef_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3000615a85af4bacf4914daabac683ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3000615a85af4bacf4914daabac683ef_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3000615a85af4bacf4914daabac683ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3000615a85af4bacf4914daabac683ef_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3000615a85af4bacf4914daabac683ef_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第5胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-075b738f19c4f4c784af3b61a1c70685_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-075b738f19c4f4c784af3b61a1c70685_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-075b738f19c4f4c784af3b61a1c70685_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-075b738f19c4f4c784af3b61a1c70685_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-075b738f19c4f4c784af3b61a1c70685_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-075b738f19c4f4c784af3b61a1c70685_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腕部，腕横纹尺侧端，尺侧腕屈肌腱的桡侧凹陷处。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-28ceb94260d1f034cbb0683353479ecf_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-28ceb94260d1f034cbb0683353479ecf_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-28ceb94260d1f034cbb0683353479ecf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-28ceb94260d1f034cbb0683353479ecf_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-28ceb94260d1f034cbb0683353479ecf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-28ceb94260d1f034cbb0683353479ecf_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足内侧缘，当足大趾本节（第1跖趾关节）后下方赤白肉际凹陷处。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c20eddffe58ab0c25bd7c956a28d0d81_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c20eddffe58ab0c25bd7c956a28d0d81_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c20eddffe58ab0c25bd7c956a28d0d81_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c20eddffe58ab0c25bd7c956a28d0d81_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c20eddffe58ab0c25bd7c956a28d0d81_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c20eddffe58ab0c25bd7c956a28d0d81_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足底部，蜷足时足前部凹陷处，约当足底第2、3跖趾缝纹头端与足跟连线的前1/3与后2/3交点上。</p><p>* 节气灸是根据二十四节气，选择各节气对人体脏腑功能有影响的穴位进行艾灸，利用艾绒燃烧产生的药热之气，对穴位进行熏灼温熨，以激发人体经络之气，温通气血，调整阴阳，帮助机体顺应自然界的变化，从而达到防病治病的目的。</p><p>▌<b>艾灸早知道</b></p><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p>© <b>视觉丨</b>峰<b>文案丨</b>范一</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5ea9a854e81c1d30dacdc53c12379e1d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5ea9a854e81c1d30dacdc53c12379e1d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5ea9a854e81c1d30dacdc53c12379e1d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;257&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5ea9a854e81c1d30dacdc53c12379e1d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5ea9a854e81c1d30dacdc53c12379e1d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5ea9a854e81c1d30dacdc53c12379e1d_b.gif\"/></figure><p></p>",

width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-706fece341afd47357227477782b4a04_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-706fece341afd47357227477782b4a04_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-706fece341afd47357227477782b4a04_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第3胸椎棘突下。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宣肺清热，宁神镇咳。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在脐中部，脐中央。</p><p><b>功效：</b>温阳救逆，利水固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在手背，第1、2掌骨间，当第2掌骨桡侧的中点处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>镇静止痛，通经活经，清热解表。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足背侧，第1、2跖骨结合部之前凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清肝泻火，燥湿生风。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足底部，蜷足时足前部凹陷处，约当足底第2、3跖趾缝纹头端与足跟连线的前1/3与后2/3交点上。</p><p><b>功效：</b>散热生气，温阳补肾。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：高热</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>正坐低头，于颈部下端第7颈椎棘突下凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清热解表，截虐止痫。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>屈肘成直角，当肘弯横纹尽头处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>经气运行之大关。清热解表，舒经通络。</p><p><b>【症状二】：痰多</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>从腿的外侧找到膝眼和外踝这两个点，连成一线，取该线中点。接着找到腿上的胫骨，胫骨前缘外侧1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>调和胃气，祛湿化痰，补益气血，醒脑安神。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在人体前臂桡侧缘，桡骨茎突上方，腕横纹上1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宣肺解表，通经活络，通调任脉。</p><p><b>【症状三】：牙关紧闭</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在面部，在颧骨下缘中央与下颌切迹之间的凹陷中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>消肿止痛，益气聪耳，通关利窍。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在面颊部，下颌角前上方，耳下大约一横指处，咀嚼时肌肉隆起时出现的凹陷处。左右各一。</p><p><b>功效：</b>祛风清热，开关通络。</p><p><b>【症状四】：角弓紧闭</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在项部，当枕骨之下，与风府相平，胸锁乳突肌与斜方肌上端之间的凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>壮阳益气，调神舒肝。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第3胸椎棘突下。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宣肺清热，宁神镇咳。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5f1cd80ee038d853959388dd3016d194_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足底部，蜷足时足前部凹陷处，约当足底第2、3跖趾缝纹头端与足跟连线的前1/3与后2/3交点上。</p><p><b>功效：</b>散热生气，温阳补肾。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：高热</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2e323c2c29e593ad880ec412f489b608_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>正坐低头，于颈部下端第7颈椎棘突下凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清热解表，截虐止痫。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>屈肘成直角，当肘弯横纹尽头处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>经气运行之大关。清热解表，舒经通络。</p><p><b>【症状二】：痰多</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>从腿的外侧找到膝眼和外踝这两个点，连成一线，取该线中点。接着找到腿上的胫骨，胫骨前缘外侧1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>调和胃气，祛湿化痰，补益气血，醒脑安神。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-114bd13d6e5586a72f14de3edb74d666_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在人体前臂桡侧缘，桡骨茎突上方，腕横纹上1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宣肺解表，通经活络，通调任脉。</p><p><b>【症状三】：牙关紧闭</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-066492ff9650bac605782668e0ed97e4_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在面部，在颧骨下缘中央与下颌切迹之间的凹陷中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>消肿止痛，益气聪耳，通关利窍。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-dd1b3717cfff434b3e6cb69eb46d66f5_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在面颊部，下颌角前上方，耳下大约一横指处，咀嚼时肌肉隆起时出现的凹陷处。左右各一。</p><p><b>功效：</b>祛风清热，开关通络。</p><p><b>【症状四】：角弓紧闭</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-53a58ad1a17b22e85f515625c23346a3_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在项部，当枕骨之下，与风府相平，胸锁乳突肌与斜方肌上端之间的凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>壮阳益气，调神舒肝。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第3胸椎棘突下。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宣肺清热，宁神镇咳。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;86&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><hr/><h2><b>主 穴</b><br/></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d400f8cc2bc999337dc9467068b88cc5_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第3胸椎棘突下。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宣肺清热，宁神镇咳。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ee06982ea69f7adccd1dece8601d99f8_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ee06982ea69f7adccd1dece8601d99f8_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ee06982ea69f7adccd1dece8601d99f8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ee06982ea69f7adccd1dece8601d99f8_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ee06982ea69f7adccd1dece8601d99f8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ee06982ea69f7adccd1dece8601d99f8_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在肘横纹中，肱二头肌腱桡侧凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清宣肺气，泻火降逆。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在前臂掌侧，当曲泽与大陵的连线上，腕横纹上2寸，掌长肌腱与桡侧腕屈肌腱之间。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宁心安神，理气止痛。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3da814ead0118c5ebff5e6c2fa1d66ce_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3da814ead0118c5ebff5e6c2fa1d66ce_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3da814ead0118c5ebff5e6c2fa1d66ce_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3da814ead0118c5ebff5e6c2fa1d66ce_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3da814ead0118c5ebff5e6c2fa1d66ce_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3da814ead0118c5ebff5e6c2fa1d66ce_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在手拇指本节（第1掌指关节）后凹陷处，约当第1掌骨中点桡侧，赤白肉际处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清宣肺气，清热利咽。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：发热</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-313d3538a612b2e092870569e1c22b83_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>屈肘成直角，当肘弯横纹尽头处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>经气运行之大关。清热解表，舒经通络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-81b3457423130090937826ee95e10619_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在手背，第1、2掌骨间，当第2掌骨桡侧的中点处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>镇静止痛，通经活经，清热解表。</p><p><b>【症状二】：久咳</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第3胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>温肺润燥，补劳清热，止咳平喘。</p><p><b>【症状三】：体弱</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
