width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;355&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a6cfcc2a8435f3fc4b0eb38af001f664_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a6cfcc2a8435f3fc4b0eb38af001f664_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>小儿遗尿的施灸穴位</b></h2><p><b>主穴：</b>肾俞、关元、中极、三阴交。</p><p><b>配穴：</b>百会、神阙、足三里（体质虚弱）</p><hr/><p>注：</p><p>1）主配穴结合，依附属症状选择施灸。温和灸/每穴10-20分钟，每日1次，5次1疗程。</p><p>2）施灸顺序应遵循先上后下、先左后右、先背部后胸腹、先头身后四肢的顺序进行。</p><hr/><p><b>取穴比量法：</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;86&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><hr/><h2><b>主 穴</b><br/></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>外散肾脏之热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下3寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培肾固本，补益元气，回阳固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cffc307ce639fa4fb91c086d0c022059_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cffc307ce639fa4fb91c086d0c022059_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cffc307ce639fa4fb91c086d0c022059_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cffc307ce639fa4fb91c086d0c022059_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cffc307ce639fa4fb91c086d0c022059_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cffc307ce639fa4fb91c086d0c022059_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐中下4寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>补肾气，利膀胱，清湿热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在内踝尖上直上3寸，按压有一骨头为胫骨，此穴位于胫骨后缘靠近骨边凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>在小腿内侧，内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后际。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状】：体质虚弱</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，后发际正中上7寸，当两耳尖直上，头顶正中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>各经脉气会聚之处。调节大脑功能，通达阴阳脉络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在脐中部，脐中央。</p><p><b>功效：</b>温阳救逆，利水固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-da3d559f0e7335d776544eb60eea0516_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在脐中部，脐中央。</p><p><b>功效：</b>温阳救逆，利水固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39b25687e95ecf8660e7a80ef53038d6_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39b25687e95ecf8660e7a80ef53038d6_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39b25687e95ecf8660e7a80ef53038d6_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39b25687e95ecf8660e7a80ef53038d6_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39b25687e95ecf8660e7a80ef53038d6_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-39b25687e95ecf8660e7a80ef53038d6_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腹部，横平脐中，前正中线旁开2寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>调理肠腑，理气行滞，消食。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1dc965747f367a1d8c31796d579be8ef_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1dc965747f367a1d8c31796d579be8ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1dc965747f367a1d8c31796d579be8ef_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1dc965747f367a1d8c31796d579be8ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1dc965747f367a1d8c31796d579be8ef_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1dc965747f367a1d8c31796d579be8ef_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>第2、3、4、5掌面，第1、2节横纹中央点取之。</p><p><b>功效：</b>消食导滞，祛痰化积。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：呕吐</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在前臂掌侧，当曲泽与大陵的连线上，腕横纹上2寸，掌长肌腱与桡侧腕屈肌腱之间。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宁心安神、理气止痛。</p><p><b>【症状二】：肠鸣</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>从腿的外侧找到膝眼和外踝这两个点，连成一线，取该线中点。接着找到腿上的胫骨，胫骨前缘外侧1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>调和胃气，祛湿化痰，补益气血，醒脑安神。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f6acc26bf9379281970e9e514da9a998_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f6acc26bf9379281970e9e514da9a998_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f6acc26bf9379281970e9e514da9a998_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f6acc26bf9379281970e9e514da9a998_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f6acc26bf9379281970e9e514da9a998_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f6acc26bf9379281970e9e514da9a998_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足内侧缘，当第1跖骨基底的前下方，赤白肉际处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾益胃，通调经脉。</p><p><b>【症状三】：腹痛</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在上腹部，前正中线上，脐上4寸处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，补中安神。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bfe7323e35b754b4a400704ed18f641_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bfe7323e35b754b4a400704ed18f641_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bfe7323e35b754b4a400704ed18f641_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bfe7323e35b754b4a400704ed18f641_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bfe7323e35b754b4a400704ed18f641_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2bfe7323e35b754b4a400704ed18f641_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在股前区，髌底上2寸，髂前上棘与髌底外侧端的连线上。</p><p><b>功效：</b>通经利节，和胃止痛。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第5胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>散发心室之热，宽胸理气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ef344dbfdd38d3a8582e078e09cc3c5d_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在前臂掌侧，当曲泽与大陵的连线上，腕横纹上2寸，掌长肌腱与桡侧腕屈肌腱之间。</p><p><b>功效：</b>宁心安神，理气止痛。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b45a0b2be07dd88b0406638b0142b71a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b45a0b2be07dd88b0406638b0142b71a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b45a0b2be07dd88b0406638b0142b71a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b45a0b2be07dd88b0406638b0142b71a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b45a0b2be07dd88b0406638b0142b71a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b45a0b2be07dd88b0406638b0142b71a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腕部，腕横纹尺侧端，尺侧腕屈肌腱的桡侧凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>补益心气，安定心神。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2dd665a512e06bd0c8426ca5353da90b_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2dd665a512e06bd0c8426ca5353da90b_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2dd665a512e06bd0c8426ca5353da90b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f789dd2a165159afb538e610e67533ce_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f789dd2a165159afb538e610e67533ce_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-f789dd2a165159afb538e610e67533ce_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，当前正中线上，耻骨联合上缘的中点处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>温补肾阳，调经止带。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e763b3afd719b35d56cf12fce7971aad_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e763b3afd719b35d56cf12fce7971aad_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e763b3afd719b35d56cf12fce7971aad_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-576794278156283940d3d60362cf7eff_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>从腿的外侧找到膝眼和外踝这两个点，连成一线，取该线中点。接着找到腿上的胫骨，胫骨前缘外侧1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>调和胃气，祛湿化痰，补益气血，醒脑安神。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;355&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"355\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3d1a3c1c6c9acb5850db331bb220c95b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3d1a3c1c6c9acb5850db331bb220c95b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>入夏，窗楹前是苍翠的树林、蝉鸣和溪流水声。</p><p>这是南国翻稻浪、北地生麦香的小满时节，随着树枝轻轻摇曳，阵阵南风将凉爽送入衣襟，陶渊明放下书卷，从榻上起身，摘下琴。</p><p>他一边弹一边吟唱——“息交游闲业，卧起弄书琴；园蔬有馀滋，旧谷犹储今。营己良有极，过足非所钦；舂秫作美酒，酒熟吾自斟。”</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-affc12d5d4b7d4fbce8d114d33513473_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-affc12d5d4b7d4fbce8d114d33513473_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;399&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-affc12d5d4b7d4fbce8d114d33513473_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-affc12d5d4b7d4fbce8d114d33513473_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不理人事，起居随心，一闲千金，读书弄琴。</p><p>陶渊明的诗大意如此，他还兴高采烈的唱着——“园圃中还有着还没摘完的菜，粮仓里尚且有够用的陈谷子啊。人们嘛，经营生活总得要有分寸，超出限度并不值得羡慕呢。不如自己捣秫子自己酿酒，酒熟了我就随心所欲地自斟自饮”——发出如此感慨的陶渊明，此时四十来岁。</p><p>距他上一次、也是最后一次出仕恰好三年了。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-136d784404875a2621ed471ef04e83ee_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-136d784404875a2621ed471ef04e83ee_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;399&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-136d784404875a2621ed471ef04e83ee_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-136d784404875a2621ed471ef04e83ee_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>人们惯于与时俱进，但是更应当懂得知止。</p><p>知止，就是人在世间的行事，必要知道自己的限度，懂得进退，该止步的时候，一定要止步，这就是陶渊明说的“营己良有极”的“极”。</p><p>三年前，陶渊明因“不为五斗米折腰”的缘故辞了官职，其实，一度摆在他面前的，何止是彭泽令的五斗米俸禄，更是通往高官厚禄的从龙之路。</p><p>陶渊明却并没有选择这条阳关道。</p><p>此前，陶渊明在镇军将军刘裕的幕府中担任参军职务。</p><p>后来成为刘宋王朝的开国皇帝的刘裕，此时正是陶渊明的顶头上司，已然位极人臣，把晋安帝掌握在自己手中，挟天子以令诸侯。</p><p>根据当时军事团体崛起的形势来看，陶渊明只要愿意在刘裕手下多钻营，就很容易功成名就，甚至等到刘裕称帝之后取得位极人臣的地位也并不是不可能——陶渊明觉得这样做并不符合他的本心，才刚刚走马赴任，他就在诗中写道——“投策命晨装，暂与园田疏；眇眇孤舟逝，绵绵归思纡。我行岂不遥，登降千里余；目倦川途异，心念山泽居。”</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ded6ad84a6caa6e6dc7ea09acfcfdd0e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ded6ad84a6caa6e6dc7ea09acfcfdd0e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;399&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ded6ad84a6caa6e6dc7ea09acfcfdd0e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ded6ad84a6caa6e6dc7ea09acfcfdd0e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>“目倦川途异，心念山泽居。”</p><p>这是陶渊明对竞逐名利的心理反弹，他知道，自己终究只适合田园生涯，并不宜于为权势、声誉与财富而奔波操劳。</p><p>但是他的同事，同样在刘裕的幕府中担任参军职务的檀道济却不一样。对于檀道济而言，这是一个平民崛起的机会，只要自己敢于竞逐，公侯指日可待。</p><p>檀道济跟随刘裕南征北战，成为一代名将，最终成为刘宋王朝的大将军、司空，而后世的人们甚至把《三十六计》的作者假托为檀道济的名字。</p><p>而陶渊明最终选择了归隐田园——“种豆南山下”、“带月荷锄归”。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2095aa411882cb028badd09242e21f59_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2095aa411882cb028badd09242e21f59_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;399&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2095aa411882cb028badd09242e21f59_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2095aa411882cb028badd09242e21f59_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>若干年后，时任江州司马的檀道济来看望老同事。</p><p>檀道济给陶渊明带来了饮食馈赠，并邀请他再度出山，但是被陶渊明拒绝了。陶渊明知道仕宦并不适合自己，他写道，“荣华诚足贵，亦复可怜伤。”</p><p>人的欲望没有止境，后世的人们常说——“终日奔波只为饥，方才一饱便思衣。衣食两般皆俱足，又想娇容笑貌妻。娶得娇妻生下子，恨无田地少根基。买到田园多广阔，出入无车少马骑。槽头扣了骡和马，叹无官职被人欺。县丞主薄犹嫌小，又要朝中挂紫衣”——有着过度强烈的进取心、不知进退的一代名将檀道济最终却遭到诛杀，其众多儿子和亲信都一同遇难。</p><p>当北方的蛮族听到檀道济遇害的消息就弹冠相庆，说是檀道济死了，南朝再也没有势均力敌的对手了。而懂得自适其适、知止而止的陶渊明，尽管过着平凡、清贫的生活，却能够终其天年，子孙相传。</p><p>一度成为同事的陶渊明、檀道济选择了不同的人生道路，究竟谁才是人生赢家呢？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ee3f43b479e3ff8684280a3d3ddf8111_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ee3f43b479e3ff8684280a3d3ddf8111_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;399&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ee3f43b479e3ff8684280a3d3ddf8111_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ee3f43b479e3ff8684280a3d3ddf8111_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>名望、财富与权势固然充满巨大诱惑，可是更有价值的是，懂得什么样的道路才适合自己、自己能够走多远、应该在何时适可而止。</p><p>然而，焦虑在当今社会已然成为一种普遍的病态：别人家的孩子、创业成功、不到二十岁却年薪五十万以上等种种社会思潮，都在想方设法刺激着不同年龄、不同境遇的人们，让众人充满紧张、焦虑、恐惧等情绪，迷失自己的方向，一味跟随时代的狂潮而拔腿狂奔。</p><p>世事既不知止，人情复不知足，持续地暴露在焦虑环境中不仅无助于成功，更会损害身心健康，若是人们不知进退，往往提早就耗尽力气，倒在半道。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f1917a4405944a96f6f66dbaa6c046d1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f1917a4405944a96f6f66dbaa6c046d1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;399&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"399\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f1917a4405944a96f6f66dbaa6c046d1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f1917a4405944a96f6f66dbaa6c046d1_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>“四月中，小满者，物致于此小得盈满。”</p><p>小满，意味着一种刚好的、最适合自己的生命状态。这种生命状态下，我们不盲从他人的步伐，不设定超出个人能力与天性以外的目标，不追求“水满则溢，月盈则亏”的过度完美。</p><p>适合自己的，才是最好的，我们只是安静地按照自己的节奏去成长，让人生进入——少而够用——的满足状态，如此，我们既不妄自尊大，也不人云亦云，只是发挥自身的人生智慧，做到知止。</p><p>知止而止，就是小满。</p><p>知止，才能走长路。</p><p>一刻艾希望以东方的古老智慧驱散这个时代的焦虑情绪。亲人朋友互艾互灸，彼此熏灼肌肤之时得以暂忘狂飙突进却又瞬息万变的时代潮流。</p><p>哪怕只是一刻、两刻的闲暇，也能趁此机会缓释自己的紧张与焦虑，甚至在闭目熏香之时，达成对自己人生道路更深刻的理解。而当暑气渐重，盛夏将至，在这湿气与燥热并重的时节，若当亲友身体有所不适，亦可通过一刻艾官方自媒体的对症下灸平台，获得古法艾灸疗法，更可以获得”冬病夏治”的效用。</p><p><b>节气灸丨除湿祛热</b></p><p>小满，夏季的第二个节气。小满过后，雨水多起来，民间有俗谚“小满小满，江满水满”。再加之天气闷热潮湿，中医称之为“湿邪”，易引发食欲不振、腹胀、腹泻等消化功能减退，还常伴有精神萎靡、嗜睡、身体乏力等症状。根据中医未病先防的理论，可利用艾灸祛除体内的湿邪，增强机体的正气和防治病邪，以防引发风湿等疾病。</p><p>▌<b>节气灸（八）丨小满养生穴位小结</b></p><p>肾俞、中脘、足三里、隐白</p><p>温和灸，每日一次，每次每穴艾灸10—15分钟，5月21日小满节气开始前3天施灸，一直灸至小满后5天结束。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03464a42929d2a68efa7e61636098538_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03464a42929d2a68efa7e61636098538_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03464a42929d2a68efa7e61636098538_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03464a42929d2a68efa7e61636098538_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03464a42929d2a68efa7e61636098538_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-03464a42929d2a68efa7e61636098538_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在上腹部，前正中线上，脐上4寸处。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a305ca4d727c5d1189d496d95658723c_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a305ca4d727c5d1189d496d95658723c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a305ca4d727c5d1189d496d95658723c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a305ca4d727c5d1189d496d95658723c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a305ca4d727c5d1189d496d95658723c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a305ca4d727c5d1189d496d95658723c_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fbaaec3f7adee062f8f3061b11d17ec0_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fbaaec3f7adee062f8f3061b11d17ec0_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fbaaec3f7adee062f8f3061b11d17ec0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fbaaec3f7adee062f8f3061b11d17ec0_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fbaaec3f7adee062f8f3061b11d17ec0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-fbaaec3f7adee062f8f3061b11d17ec0_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足大趾内侧，趾甲角旁开0.1寸，红白交处。</p><hr/><p>* 节气灸是根据二十四节气，选择各节气对人体脏腑功能有影响的穴位进行艾灸，利用艾绒燃烧产生的药热之气，对穴位进行熏灼温熨，以激发人体经络之气，温通气血，调整阴阳，帮助机体顺应自然界的变化，从而达到防病治病的目的。</p><hr/><p>▌<b>艾灸早知道</b></p><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p>© <b>视觉丨</b>峰<b>文案丨</b>范一</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下3寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培肾固本，补益元气，回阳固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后际。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，调补肝肾，行气活血，疏经通络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足大趾内侧，趾甲角旁开0.1寸，红白交处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>生发脾气，温阳回厥，清心宁神，调经统血。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足趾，大趾末节外侧，趾甲根角侧后方0.1寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>苏厥醒神，清利湿热，理气调肝。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：血紫有块</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>侧坐屈膝90度，用左手掌心对准右髌骨中央，手掌伏于膝盖上，拇指与其他4指约成45度，拇指尖所指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>化血为气，运化脾血。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足背侧，第1、2跖骨结合部之前凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清肝泻火，燥湿生风。</p><p><b>【症状二】：身倦无力</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，后发际正中上7寸，当两耳尖直上，头顶正中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>各经脉气会聚之处。调节大脑功能，通达阴阳脉络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背中，当第7胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>活血通脉，养血和营，理气宽胸。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下3寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培肾固本，补益元气，回阳固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后际。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，调补肝肾，行气活血，疏经通络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-485dfec2a0b57c8291ee1dad3f0281f4_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足大趾内侧，趾甲角旁开0.1寸，红白交处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>生发脾气，温阳回厥，清心宁神，调经统血。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-18b0ee722fa00b209df4eda6e333f3d5_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足趾，大趾末节外侧，趾甲根角侧后方0.1寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>苏厥醒神，清利湿热，理气调肝。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：血紫有块</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cd781e3a04f7ea678a131f84deca85bc_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>侧坐屈膝90度，用左手掌心对准右髌骨中央，手掌伏于膝盖上，拇指与其他4指约成45度，拇指尖所指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>化血为气，运化脾血。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足背侧，第1、2跖骨结合部之前凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清肝泻火，燥湿生风。</p><p><b>【症状二】：身倦无力</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-37997768c31e596bf8f94fde3554fd77_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，后发际正中上7寸，当两耳尖直上，头顶正中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>各经脉气会聚之处。调节大脑功能，通达阴阳脉络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>利下焦，补元气，行气散滞。</p><p><b>【症状三】：血虚</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-74d40475d746d51b25101c9c8edb72cf_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背中，当第7胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>活血通脉，养血和营，理气宽胸。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第11胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>利湿升清，健脾和胃，益气壮阳。</p><p><b>【症状四】：腰膝腿软</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>外散肾脏之热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足内侧，内踝后方与脚跟骨筋腱之间的凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清热生气，滋阴益肾，壮阳强腰。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "一刻艾-对症下灸丨产后少乳的艾灸疗法", 
            "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
