width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df4c529c6f9e7253aa5b464efcacc858_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df4c529c6f9e7253aa5b464efcacc858_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>产后少乳的施灸穴位</b></h2><p><b>主穴：</b>膻中、乳根、少泽。</p><p><b>配穴：</b>期门、太冲（乳房肿痛）</p><p>气海、足三里（体质虚弱）</p><hr/><p>注：</p><p>1）主配穴结合，依附属症状选择施灸。温和灸/每穴15-30分钟，每日1次，5次1疗程；</p><p>2）施灸顺序应遵循先上后下、先左后右、先背部后胸腹、先头身后四肢的顺序进行。</p><hr/><p><b>取穴比量法：</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;86&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><hr/><h2><b>主 穴</b><br/></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-da715b558be7580385a23ff6ea7f0149_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-da715b558be7580385a23ff6ea7f0149_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-da715b558be7580385a23ff6ea7f0149_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-da715b558be7580385a23ff6ea7f0149_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-da715b558be7580385a23ff6ea7f0149_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-da715b558be7580385a23ff6ea7f0149_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>前正中线，平第4肋间，两乳头连线的中点。</p><p><b>功效：</b>利上焦，宽胸膈，降气通络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6b1a65d87dbb8e0ca24e393dffe30ba1_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6b1a65d87dbb8e0ca24e393dffe30ba1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6b1a65d87dbb8e0ca24e393dffe30ba1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6b1a65d87dbb8e0ca24e393dffe30ba1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6b1a65d87dbb8e0ca24e393dffe30ba1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-6b1a65d87dbb8e0ca24e393dffe30ba1_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在胸部，当乳头直下，乳房根部，当第5肋间隙，距前正中线4寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>通乳化淤，宣肺理气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd4ec5dac31ad913d5f09c2011aa1a38_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd4ec5dac31ad913d5f09c2011aa1a38_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd4ec5dac31ad913d5f09c2011aa1a38_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd4ec5dac31ad913d5f09c2011aa1a38_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd4ec5dac31ad913d5f09c2011aa1a38_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dd4ec5dac31ad913d5f09c2011aa1a38_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>小指尺侧指甲角旁0.1寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清热通乳，散淤利窍。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：乳房肿痛</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a2e2efc2942182992cc4e1ea86e6c949_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a2e2efc2942182992cc4e1ea86e6c949_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a2e2efc2942182992cc4e1ea86e6c949_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a2e2efc2942182992cc4e1ea86e6c949_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a2e2efc2942182992cc4e1ea86e6c949_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-a2e2efc2942182992cc4e1ea86e6c949_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>位于胸部，当乳头直下，第6肋间隙，前正中线旁开4寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾疏肝，理气活血。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-46831d3d853e45561f554135261b4e7a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足背侧，第1、2跖骨结合部之前凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清肝泻火，燥湿生风。</p><p><b>【症状二】：体质虚弱</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>利下焦，补元气，行气散滞。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下3寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培肾固本，补益元气，回阳固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐中下4寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>补肾气，利膀胱，清湿热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b81f9526b2eb9d723a01c10ba81e3385_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b81f9526b2eb9d723a01c10ba81e3385_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b81f9526b2eb9d723a01c10ba81e3385_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b81f9526b2eb9d723a01c10ba81e3385_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b81f9526b2eb9d723a01c10ba81e3385_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b81f9526b2eb9d723a01c10ba81e3385_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在会阴部，男性当阴囊根部与肛门连线的中点，女性当大阴唇后联合与肛门连线的中点。</p><p><b>功效：</b>疏通体内脉结，促进阴阳气的交接与循环，调节生理和生殖功能。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：急性</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b0fa8f19cb10c89933003a288de323a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿外侧，当腓骨头前下方凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>舒肝解郁，消炎利胆。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后际。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，调补肝肾，行气活血，疏经通络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8584fe67ce3ba9da7e2943c4eba3ba9_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8584fe67ce3ba9da7e2943c4eba3ba9_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8584fe67ce3ba9da7e2943c4eba3ba9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8584fe67ce3ba9da7e2943c4eba3ba9_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8584fe67ce3ba9da7e2943c4eba3ba9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8584fe67ce3ba9da7e2943c4eba3ba9_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，太溪穴直上2寸，跟腱的前方。</p><p><b>功效：</b>补肾益阴，温阳利水。</p><p><b>【症状二】：慢性</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>外散肾脏之热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1bfbc1f7d65d84c766fbcc424b1a299d_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在足内侧，内踝后方与脚跟骨筋腱之间的凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>清热生气，滋阴益肾，壮阳强腰。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d6da162f7a90c8325d563270fb77a391_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d6da162f7a90c8325d563270fb77a391_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d6da162f7a90c8325d563270fb77a391_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当后正中线上，第2腰椎棘突下凹陷中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培元固本，强健腰膝。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e2bfd41957452d066234fb8da1530c2d_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e2bfd41957452d066234fb8da1530c2d_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e2bfd41957452d066234fb8da1530c2d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后际。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，调补肝肾，行气活血，疏经通络。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b><br/></h2><p><b>【症状一】：失眠心悸</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>第5胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>散发心室之热，宽胸理气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-94b3241b657b432ef4e49baf2aeae7c3_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第11胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>利湿升清，健脾和胃，益气壮阳。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4b0bbd6720b2e344a87ad4a1de09c804_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-4b0bbd6720b2e344a87ad4a1de09c804_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>遗精的施灸穴位</b></h2><p><b>主穴：</b>心俞、肾俞、关元、阴陵泉、三阴交。</p><hr/><p>注：</p><p>1）温和灸/每次共灸30分钟，每日1次，10次1疗程，灸至症状好转后可隔天1次；</p><p>2）施灸顺序应遵循先上后下、先左后右、先背部后胸腹、先头身后四肢的顺序进行。</p><hr/><p><b>取穴比量法：</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;86&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><hr/><h2><b>主 穴</b><br/></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-6f40a0f0f216e9af73bdbc7d75408d7c_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第5胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>散发心室之热，宽胸理气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-13ebd32caefc59266fb87f1ead725c12_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>外散肾脏之热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下3寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培肾固本，补益元气，回阳固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-143db58a7130ad797725a43126098350_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-143db58a7130ad797725a43126098350_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-143db58a7130ad797725a43126098350_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-143db58a7130ad797725a43126098350_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-143db58a7130ad797725a43126098350_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-143db58a7130ad797725a43126098350_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，胫骨内侧下缘与胫骨内侧缘之间的凹陷中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>排渗脾湿，益肾调经。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，当足内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后方。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，调补肝肾，行气活血，疏经通络。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e4808258c102200ffe06f9f73cb1434f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;580&#39; height=&#39;196&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f46ecbe22e885297ab82d18ef4f62873_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f46ecbe22e885297ab82d18ef4f62873_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f46ecbe22e885297ab82d18ef4f62873_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f46ecbe22e885297ab82d18ef4f62873_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>糖尿病的施灸穴位</b></h2><p><b>主穴：</b>胰俞、三焦俞、气海、关元、阳池、足三里、三阴交。</p><p><b>配穴：</b>肺俞（多饮）</p><p>胃俞、中脘、足三里（多食消疫）</p><p>命门、肾俞、中极（多尿）</p><hr/><p>注：</p><p>1）主配穴结合，依附属症状选择施灸。温和灸/每穴15-20分钟，每日1-2次，10次1疗程；</p><p>2）施灸顺序应遵循先上后下、先左后右、先背部后胸腹、先头身后四肢的顺序进行。</p><hr/><p><b>取穴比量法：</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;86&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"86\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-c35ab801d0322485ddcaa701579bfc69_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><hr/><h2><b>主 穴</b></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc4aaa8b7daa7389055a9d7980fdd545_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc4aaa8b7daa7389055a9d7980fdd545_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc4aaa8b7daa7389055a9d7980fdd545_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc4aaa8b7daa7389055a9d7980fdd545_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc4aaa8b7daa7389055a9d7980fdd545_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc4aaa8b7daa7389055a9d7980fdd545_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第8胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>疏肝利胆，活血化淤，养胰健脾，调和肠胃。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c0de285f97e167bbe976874829a60c3c_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c0de285f97e167bbe976874829a60c3c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c0de285f97e167bbe976874829a60c3c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c0de285f97e167bbe976874829a60c3c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c0de285f97e167bbe976874829a60c3c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c0de285f97e167bbe976874829a60c3c_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第1腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>外散三焦腑之热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0105616e872d8df6a254f24cea7c0121_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>利下焦，补元气，行气散滞。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-66fc4bb3ccbceb1263d4f3e243e02b90_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下3寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培肾固本，补益元气，回阳固脱。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca93e1de9b5e78b5c217e6965867c105_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca93e1de9b5e78b5c217e6965867c105_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca93e1de9b5e78b5c217e6965867c105_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca93e1de9b5e78b5c217e6965867c105_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca93e1de9b5e78b5c217e6965867c105_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ca93e1de9b5e78b5c217e6965867c105_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腕背横纹中，当指总伸肌腱的尺侧缘凹陷处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>生发阳气，沟通表里。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-078007d150703a2ce0264999ce7a128a_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿内侧，内踝尖上3寸，胫骨内侧缘后际。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，调补肝肾，行气活血，疏经通络。</p><hr/><h2><b>配 穴</b></h2><p><b>【症状一】：多饮</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-75f77dfeea0f55eb9eab5d26d7cea899_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第3胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>温肺润燥，补劳清热，止咳平喘。</p><p><b>【症状二】：多食消疫</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f348682c6f558e0f00423cf0478d399f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f348682c6f558e0f00423cf0478d399f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f348682c6f558e0f00423cf0478d399f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f348682c6f558e0f00423cf0478d399f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f348682c6f558e0f00423cf0478d399f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f348682c6f558e0f00423cf0478d399f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>脊柱区，当第12胸椎棘突下，后正中线旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>外散胃腑之热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68fb96e9b41d7e70655b136a2bbdcf14_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在上腹部，前正中线上，脐上4寸处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>健脾和胃，补中安神。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8256577c27bdff8c7264d70127eee44f_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在小腿前外侧，膝盖凹陷处下方约3寸（4横指），距胫骨外侧约1横指处。</p><p><b>功效：</b>燥化脾湿，生发胃气。</p><p><b>【症状三】：多尿</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-63e335b4e7ac2933fde7f8ae8aa16ac9_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当后正中线上，第2腰椎棘突下凹陷中。</p><p><b>功效：</b>培元固本，强健腰膝。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-df3371d07b6e4051a41a7deecd030b08_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>外散肾脏之热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2667&#39; height=&#39;1526&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2667\" data-rawheight=\"1526\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2667\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-a29718cccaeccbfaa9d371e69b3d16ef_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐中下4寸。</p><p><b>功效：</b>补肾气，利膀胱，清湿热。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;35&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"35\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-3301992b7bd5d37b1348b80e182695ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>艾灸早知道</b></h2><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-340142c9fe44a5e321d164699ab169fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-340142c9fe44a5e321d164699ab169fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "一刻艾-立夏丨最好的年华，做最妙的事", 
            "content": "<p></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;580&#39; height=&#39;196&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"580\" data-rawheight=\"196\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"580\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-68c7da0b24d93a717491b03933e19835_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-545c71a13cab3d67eb4131b04089e714_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-545c71a13cab3d67eb4131b04089e714_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;356&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"356\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-545c71a13cab3d67eb4131b04089e714_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-545c71a13cab3d67eb4131b04089e714_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一讲起早夏，心头就有一种讲不清的思绪。</p><p>早夏的时节，不似春日的潮湿，也不像盛夏的浓烈——蝉初鸣，风竹摇，阳光刚刚好——立夏的感觉最显轻闲，总让人们想起儿时的街市、乘凉的蒲扇、老冰棍与荷塘夜色。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bf7d17aa02ed84d70f45aa54c74fffc0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bf7d17aa02ed84d70f45aa54c74fffc0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;400&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bf7d17aa02ed84d70f45aa54c74fffc0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-bf7d17aa02ed84d70f45aa54c74fffc0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>沈从文曾经说过，“我行过许多地方的桥，看过许多次数的云，喝过许多种类的酒，却只爱过一个正当最好年龄的人”——如若将这个正当好的年华比作时节，那一定是早夏。</p><p>灿若夏花，是所有人的田园诗和青春之歌。</p><p><b>来，谱一曲早夏的轻闲六重奏</b></p><p>当五月带着湖面上的晓雾、树枝头闪烁的阳光、青春年少的记忆而来，让夏天在世人面前慢慢呈现清新的颜容，我们不如演绎一曲行云流水般的轻闲六重奏，对这样的时日珍而重之。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4d2f99c661aa50f21ae2608dcbe49339_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4d2f99c661aa50f21ae2608dcbe49339_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;400&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4d2f99c661aa50f21ae2608dcbe49339_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4d2f99c661aa50f21ae2608dcbe49339_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>▌<b>早夏轻闲之一，听蛙</b></p><p>听，“古池子，青蛙一跃，扑水声声。”正如“鸟鸣山更幽”的意境，在松尾芭蕉做的俳句中，青蛙入水声打破夏日的安静，却也让闲寂的心情一览无余。又或“黄梅时节家家雨，青草池塘处处蛙。有约不来过夜半，闲敲棋子落灯花。”友人来也罢，不来也罢，不如安安静静，听取蛙声一片。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7e5fab5cafb764a3181d3361e257d61_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7e5fab5cafb764a3181d3361e257d61_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;400&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7e5fab5cafb764a3181d3361e257d61_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d7e5fab5cafb764a3181d3361e257d61_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>▌<b>早夏轻闲之二，观荷</b></p><p>荷叶铺满了水面，被路过的南风翻遍，变成一片荷浪，让风中遍布着荷香和清凉，这时候“小荷才露尖尖角”，却让人惦记初夏的晚上，还是少年的我们坐在水边，把光脚丫伸进夜凉如水的月色中，或者说说闲话，或者谈谈梦想，或者什么都不说，只呆呆的遥望“今夕何夕”的皎皎明月光。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0741b27aca66858fa3d4a80795ade91_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"401\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0741b27aca66858fa3d4a80795ade91_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;401&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"401\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0741b27aca66858fa3d4a80795ade91_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0741b27aca66858fa3d4a80795ade91_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>▌<b>早夏轻事之三，探樱</b></p><p>过去的夏天，唐人将蔬果做了排行，樱桃荣登三甲，成了夏令美味中的“探花”，樱桃不仅美味，也因其鲜红可爱，正如美人的红唇，也就慢慢变成了美人的代表，李商隐描写一位女子就用“红绽樱桃含白雪”来描摹她的唇齿，想一想还真没错，初夏的樱桃恰似人们青春年少时的初恋味道。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2abd4cde8e9dc4a0ce0bce2fb2f10ca0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2abd4cde8e9dc4a0ce0bce2fb2f10ca0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;400&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2abd4cde8e9dc4a0ce0bce2fb2f10ca0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2abd4cde8e9dc4a0ce0bce2fb2f10ca0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>▌<b>早夏闲事之四，浮瓜</b></p><p>无论时代怎么改变，夏天最让人依依眷恋的还是冰镇西瓜，三国时期曹丕给老朋友写信说，“浮甘瓜于清泉，沈朱李于寒水”，到了上个世纪，尽管街头叫卖的冰棍汽水让小孩子眼馋，可是刚从冰凉井水中捞出来的西瓜，却使得院子里的一家老小都喜笑颜开，仿佛夏天就应该这么清凉。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcc1f99e560539dd5f28d34acad3d7e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcc1f99e560539dd5f28d34acad3d7e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;400&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcc1f99e560539dd5f28d34acad3d7e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6dcc1f99e560539dd5f28d34acad3d7e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>▌<b>早夏闲事之五，弄竹</b></p><p>“宁可食无肉，不可居无竹。”入夏，何妨在萤火飞舞的溪涧边，抱着西瓜端坐竹凉床上，听细长的竹叶在风中沙沙做响，享受着竹席子、竹凳子、竹枕头散发出的清香，真是一日不可无此君，而“葛帷藤簟，石枕竹夫人”所说的“竹夫人”，更让卧席而眠的人们，得以在夏夜安享清凉好梦。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eb8b730a9723534bb6ba39c5a745a2d2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eb8b730a9723534bb6ba39c5a745a2d2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;400&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eb8b730a9723534bb6ba39c5a745a2d2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-eb8b730a9723534bb6ba39c5a745a2d2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>▌<b>早夏闲事之六，挥扇</b></p><p>鸢尾花盛开的时候，扇子也被人们想起来了。当夏“朱明盛长，敷与万物”，即便是一把蒲扇也为旧时光带来习习凉风，都说“轻罗小扇扑流萤”，每当黄昏人们坐在街巷边喝着茶，要么谈天说地，要么在棋盘上摆开车马，谁都离不开一把扇子，虽然昔日不再，回想起来耳侧仿佛仍然有风。</p><p>是的，早夏是人们最简单、最美好的记忆。</p><p>早夏是无法忘怀的南风草木香，是古镇幽巷的榴花著意红，是每个人的田园牧歌和歌声中的梨涡浅笑，曾经的早夏充满了许许多多的小确幸——正是这些小而确定的幸福，让人们享受这份独有的轻闲时日——不妨，趁现在，重温这些美好。</p><p>让早夏的日子，慢慢过。</p><p>夏天，到了。</p><p><b>长夏有艾，修心养性</b></p><p>夏天是天地阳气最盛之时，正是通过艾灸调理身体的最好季节。借助艾灸，实现天时的阳气与艾灸的纯阳之气的交会，是护持健康的最佳时机。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d9c9f4144e72c33b6d2cf02b7c50490e_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d9c9f4144e72c33b6d2cf02b7c50490e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;400&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"400\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d9c9f4144e72c33b6d2cf02b7c50490e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d9c9f4144e72c33b6d2cf02b7c50490e_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>一刻艾致力于古法艾灸，希望人们通过艾灸之道，修心养性，让生活中所有的小确幸，汇聚成大幸福。一刻艾以大数据技术精心打造对症下灸平台，人们可以通过官方自媒体获得古法艾灸疗法，不仅可以帮助人们祛除身体的不适，还能具有提高免疫力的保健作用。</p><p>立夏，艾灸正当时。</p><p><b>节气灸丨护心养阳</b></p><p>传统日历中，立夏为巳月，“巳者，起也，物至于此，毕尽而起也。”立夏是夏季的开始，草木茂盛，树荫初成，炎气时至，天气也越发热了。这时人体阳气如若不足，心血对脏腑的濡养就会不足，增加心脏的负担，心血输出增加同时回流不足，容易出现乏力、嗜睡、无精打采、失眠，长期积累而导致心肌缺血。艾灸能够通过穴位特性升腾人体阳气，通利“心气”，因此，立夏艾灸应着重注意护心养阳。</p><p>▌<b>节气灸（七）丨立夏养生穴位小结</b></p><p>大椎、心俞、肾俞、膻中、神阙、关元</p><p>温和灸，每日一次，每次每穴艾灸10—15分钟，5月5—7日，连灸三天。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-007a677895775f9356a720f96737e08b_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-007a677895775f9356a720f96737e08b_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-007a677895775f9356a720f96737e08b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-007a677895775f9356a720f96737e08b_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-007a677895775f9356a720f96737e08b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-007a677895775f9356a720f96737e08b_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>正坐低头，于颈部下端第7颈椎棘突下凹陷处。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2385c663c51402e0a78ac517ee392fd_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2385c663c51402e0a78ac517ee392fd_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2385c663c51402e0a78ac517ee392fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2385c663c51402e0a78ac517ee392fd_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2385c663c51402e0a78ac517ee392fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b2385c663c51402e0a78ac517ee392fd_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在背部，当第5胸椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ba208e48f528c96d2311d3f0a108be1_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05829f9f511fd39015af8d5e2f8d8957_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05829f9f511fd39015af8d5e2f8d8957_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05829f9f511fd39015af8d5e2f8d8957_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05829f9f511fd39015af8d5e2f8d8957_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05829f9f511fd39015af8d5e2f8d8957_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-05829f9f511fd39015af8d5e2f8d8957_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>前正中线，平第4肋间，两乳头连线的中点。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300bd1cb55e113ebdcdae02274e8cbfc_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300bd1cb55e113ebdcdae02274e8cbfc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300bd1cb55e113ebdcdae02274e8cbfc_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300bd1cb55e113ebdcdae02274e8cbfc_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300bd1cb55e113ebdcdae02274e8cbfc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-300bd1cb55e113ebdcdae02274e8cbfc_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在脐中部，脐中央。</p><p>▼</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1f78c530147431623e0654ecb4240174_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1f78c530147431623e0654ecb4240174_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1f78c530147431623e0654ecb4240174_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;366&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"366\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1f78c530147431623e0654ecb4240174_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1f78c530147431623e0654ecb4240174_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1f78c530147431623e0654ecb4240174_b.gif\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>取穴：</b>在下腹部，前正中线上，当脐下3寸。</p><hr/><p>* 节气灸是根据二十四节气，选择各节气对人体脏腑功能有影响的穴位进行艾灸，利用艾绒燃烧产生的药热之气，对穴位进行熏灼温熨，以激发人体经络之气，温通气血，调整阴阳，帮助机体顺应自然界的变化，从而达到防病治病的目的。</p><hr/><p>▌<b>艾灸早知道</b></p><p>✓ 艾灸时要做好保暖，避免施灸部位着凉；</p><p>✓ 艾灸前后要喝一杯温水，有助排泄器官排出体内毒素；</p><p>✓ 灸后半小时内不要用冷水洗手，2小时内不要洗澡；</p><p>✓ 灸后不要吃寒凉饮料、水果和海鲜；</p><p>✓ 饭后1小时不宜艾灸；女性经期不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 过饥、过饱、醉酒、大恐、大怒、大渴状态下不宜艾灸；</p><p>✓ 灸后若有余艾，要用熄灭筒彻底熄灭或放入罐中盖严熄灭；</p><p>✓ 灸后若出现极大不适或病情加重，请前往医院辩证施治。</p><p>© <b>视觉丨</b>西蒙<b>文案丨</b>范一</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;257&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"257\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-f8d2f8f7dee51fac06885e2db9f4e985_b.gif\"/></figure><p></p>",
